com.matrixone.apps.domain.util
Class RegistrationUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.RegistrationUtil

public class RegistrationUtil
extends java.lang.Object

The RegistrationUtil class represents the Admin type property Registration, Create,Transfer,Update and Delete the registration of the admin type objects and the registering of newly created lifecycle states of an existing or new policy.

Version:
AEF 10.6 - Copyright (c) 2003, MatrixOne, Inc.
Author:
Wipro Offshore
